about_the_game:
A game that blends exploration and adventure , offering two modes. In the dynamic RPG mode, players confront powerful bosses and equip weapons and armor to build their strength. In the solo platformer mode, players navigate treacherous environments filled with obstacles to reclaim lost powers.

Open-World RPG MODE - Solo and Multiplayer

Explore an expansive open world filled with mysteries and challenges. Play solo, join friends, or connect to a server to team up with other players from around the globe. Journey across three diverse regions in search of answers about a long-lost fourth region. Equip weapons and armor to build your strength, improve your character's abilities and uncover secrets in a rich, interconnected world designed for cooperation and discovery.

PLATFORMER MODE - Solo Only

Step into the shoes of a legendary adventurer who disappeared 1,000 years ago. This solo-only mode focuses on precise platforming and reclaiming lost powers as you navigate challenging environments.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for multiplayer. SSD required.
